sentences.sContent: I have never beaten my wife and never will. I find assault of others completely repugnant, and assault of women especially so.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have never beaten my wife and never will. I find assault of others completely repugnant, and assault of women especially so.
sentences.sCn: 我从没有也永远不会打我的妻子，我认为殴打他人的人非常令人反感，尤其是打女人。

sentences.sContent: "[The photos are] repugnant to us as human beings and contrary to the standards and values of the United States army," the statement said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "[The photos are] repugnant to us as human beings and contrary to the standards and values of the United States army," the statement said.
sentences.sCn: 声明中说，“这些照片违背了美国军队的准则和价值观，也让同为人类一员的我们感到恶心”。

sentences.sContent: Of course the idea of the U.S. government "owning" every single asset of the American people is repugnant to our entire way of life, but let's assume that for a moment.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of course the idea of the U.S. government "owning" every single asset of the American people is repugnant to our entire way of life, but let's assume that for a moment.
sentences.sCn: 当然美国政府“拥有”美国人民的每一份财产的这个想法是让人恶心的，与我们整个的生活方式完全相反，不过让我们假设一下那种情况。

remMethod.val: re + pugn(打斗) + ant → 总是打斗 → 令人厌恶的
